db:abstract.db:para: The QFlag class is a helper data type for QFlags.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: It is equivalent to a plain int, except with respect to function overloading and type conversions. You should never need to use this class in your applications.

db:section.db:title: QFlag::QFlag(int value)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QFlag object that stores the given value.

db:section.db:title: [default, since 5.3] QFlag::QFlag(short value)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QFlag object that stores the given value.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: [default, since Qt 5.3] QFlag::QFlag(uint value)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QFlag object that stores the given value.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: [default, since Qt 5.3] QFlag::QFlag(ushort value)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QFlag object that stores the given value.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: int QFlag::operator int() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value stored by the QFlag object.
